articles.author: Sam Meredith
articles.title: What if Russia turns off the gas? Europe assesses its options as fears mount over Ukraine crisis - CNBC
articles.description: As tensions reach a fever pitch between Russia, Ukraine and the West, energy analysts are deeply concerned about the risk of full supply disruption to the EU.
articles.content: A worker adjusts a pipeline valve at the Gazprom PJSC Slavyanskaya compressor station, the starting point of the Nord Stream 2 gas pipeline, in Ust-Luga, Russia, on Thursday, Jan. 28, 2021. Nord Stre… [+7051 chars]
